Class Transition

extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a transition with probability, application condition.

      • product

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Transition> product(java.util.ArrayList<Transition> t1,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Transition> t2,
                                      BDDService bddService)
        Calculate product of two array of transitions (two columnar matrices of transitions),
        Parameters:
        t1 -
        t2 -
        bddService -
        Returns:
        result = t1 x t2 = Sigma ( y1 ^ y2 ) / (p1 x p2), returns arraylist of transitions

      • sum

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Transition> sum(java.util.ArrayList<Transition> r,
                                  Transition transition)
        Calculate sum of a transition and an arraylist of transitions The formula as in article: w/p + r
        if (w in domain of r): (r-w/r(w)) U w/(p+r(w)) o.w: r U w/p
        Parameters:
        r -
        transition -
        Returns:
        arraylist of transitions

      • isWeaker

        public boolean isWeaker(Transition that)
        We say w is weaker than w' if the set of products satisfying w is a superset of the same set for w'.
        Parameters:
        that - Transition
        Returns:
        boolean, true if this is weaker transition
